skills.title: AI/NLP Engineering
skills.description: Hands on experience with classic ML models, deep learning models, and LLMs through my research and coursework. Experienced with frameworks such as PyTorch and TensorFlow.

skills.title: Software Development
skills.description: Professional experience as a full-time Software Engineer in a Big Tech company setting. Experienced in full-stack development, web development, database management, data structures, and algorithms.

skills.title: Research
skills.description: Currently engaged in hands-on graduate NLP research. Machine learning/Computer Vision research experience from past internships. Experience presenting research at conferences (Computation Approaches for Cancer Workshop, 2021).

skills.title: Collaboration
skills.description: Experience cross-cutting across teams and working with wide range of Senior Developers, Managers, PMs, and customers to create software solutions. I love working with others and do best in a collaborative team environment!

portfolio.title: ChatNYT
portfolio.description: A ChatGPT-assisted iteration of everybody's favorite (and most frustrating) NYT game, Wordle.

portfolio.title: Generative Adversarial Learning for Automatic Red-Teaming against Large Language Model Jailbreak Attacks
portfolio.description: Exploring using a GAN architecture to automatically generate jailbreak prompts to better defend against LLM attacks.

portfolio.title: NASA JPL Research Project: Deep Learning for Segmenting Cell Nuclei in Multiplexed Images
portfolio.description: Improving upon State of The Art detection models for cell nuclei by creating our own computer vision network.

portfolio.title: Measuring Political Sentiment in Tweets through Weighted Hashtag Analysis
portfolio.description: Improving Political Sentiment Analysis performance by allocating a custom weighting to embeddings of hashtagged phrases.
